p: Since December 2019, there have been a series of unexplained cases of pneumonia in Wuhan, whose clinical manifestations are very similar to those of viral pneumonia. Deep sequencing of the patients' lower respiratory tract samples showed that the source of infection was a new type of coronavirus. On February 11, 2019, the new coronavirus was named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2), according to the international committee for the classification of virus. Meanwhile, world health organization (WHO) decided to name the disease caused by SARS-CoV-2 as Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). Many studies have reported epidemics in adults and even the old, but attention has rarely been paid to reports on children patients. Here we present a child case with mild symptoms.
